claim: These hashtags remained very popular in 2021, and together with #virtuallearning, #blendedlearning, #onlineeducation, and #digitallearning made up 16.10% (69,737 tweets by 10,611 authors) of #EdTech, while dropping to a mere 9% (43,034 tweets by 5910 authors) in 2022 (see Fig. 1).
title: Fig. 1.
caption: COVID-19 Related Tweets in the #EdTech Affinity Space

claim: Analysis of readers’ country of origin and device type (Fig. 2) revealed that EdTech Books resources were heavily used throughout the world and accessed on a variety of devices.
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Most Common Countries and Device Types of ETB Users for 2022
